title: New Elementalist Lux Icons only have 1 Profile Background is this a bug?
body:
Only reason I got the bundle with the Icons is because I thought each Icon would have their respective element as the profile banner. Seeing as every other Ultimate skin besides {{champion:81}} has at least 3. Udyr has bear foram, turtle, phynix and tiger profile banner(or background whatever it's called). Same thing for DJ sona. If there is no plan to have these icons have unique backgrounds I seriously want a refund. [](http://imgur.com/rumSnRF) [](http://imgur.com/YuFRW8l)
http://imgur.com/rumSnRF
http://imgur.com/YuFRW8l

replies.body:
Hey SNOW SOS - 

Due to the choice to have one splash art, the profile banner will not change based on your icon, but will show the light form regardless of the Elementalist Lux icon you have equipped. Same would go for champion select - you would only see the one (light form) splash/motion graphic.

Splashes can take a month+ each to complete, and cannot be rendered until the final models and textures are complete. If we opted for ten splashes, Elementalist Lux wouldn't have been announced or available until next year. Early on, we opted for do one splash (light because it's the form she starts in) and then hint to the other elements in the stained glass behind her.

Hi Riot KateyKhaos! I was also wondering why the background didn't change so I came to this thread. I was unsure if I should send a ticket about it or just post it here, but... If you go to the skins collection and you go to the Theme Features which replaces the description of the skin, the last point clearly states that the skin has "Five exclusive icons which grant dynamic profile background"

While I understand why you have decided not to go through with this feature, I think this point should either be taken out or it should just exclude the part talking about dynamic profile backgrounds because this particular point chose me to buy elementalist lux over project sona and if I had known that it would not be included I would have changed my mind.

Thanks!!
